summary: This bill, the Expanding Access to Family Planning Act, establishes a Title X Clinic Fund to provide increased funding for family planning services. The bill appropriates over $560 million annually from 2026-2035, with funds allocated for grants and contracts to Title X clinics and for clinic infrastructure. The bill outlines conditions for funding, emphasizing non-directive pregnancy counseling and prohibiting restrictions on subaward participation based on reasons other than an inability to provide services.
